channel.title: What would you like to see in a game like minecraft?
channel.description:
I wasn't even aware of [url=http://minecraft.net/]minecraft[/url] until yesterday (thanks sppt :)), but it's a neat idea with some potential, I just think it needs a lot of work. It's something I think I would like to turn into a project and work on actively. I believe I would go with java for the language, because I like the idea of a web applet. (although I would allow full screen and such) But here is a list of things I am considering supporting (in addition to what minecraft currently supports):
[ol][li]Different shapes, such as cones, prisms, cylinders etc.[/li] [li]Instead of building one block at a time, you could build a structure with multiple blocks, and then save it to build it later (possibly re-oriented, this would make building stairs or buildings much easier, for example for a 4-sided building you would only have to build 1 side and then use it 3 more times)[/li] [li]I don't believe bigger maps would be a problem, along with some other scenery in the distance perhaps.[/li] [li]Better graphics, a little more detail wouldn't kill anyone. Current minecraft looks like it was built in 1989, not 2009.[/li] [li]Minimap[/li] [li]Plugin support for more block types[/li] [li]Always free to play[/li] [li][b]You suggest more for here...[/b][/li][/ol]
